entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 12:07 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: N 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
